Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 12th overall pick, by Cleveland in 2006...
Had first career hit (triple) on 7/2/2008, off Jeremy Guthrie (DET)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/14/2009, off Barry Zito (KCA)...
Traded from Cleveland to Pittsburgh on 5/30/2012 (Going to CLE: C E. Guzman. Going to PIT: C H. Conger, RF R. Ortega)...
Signed as a free agent by New York (A) on 2/2/2014 to a 3-year deal worth $2,500,000 per year...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Chicago (A) on 7/12/2015...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 2015...
Injured on 8/11/2016 with a Fractured Wrist, out for 3 weeks...
Won World Championship with New York (A) in 2016...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston on 9/17/2018...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago (A) on 5/25/2022...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/21/2024 to a 1-year deal worth $928,800 per year...
